title.ui:help: Title should be minimum 50 and maximum 140 characters.

links.ui:help: A minimum of 1 link and maximum of 6 article links from allowed domain can be added.

analysis.ui:help: Analysis should be minimum 300 and maximum 390 characters. Use markdown to convert parts of the analysis to link to articles. Example: This is a sample text [Link text][1] i.e. [<article text>][<link number from 1-6>].
